name: MGT April Art Jam Showcase
description:
Art Jam Showcase

In April 2022, artists and animators came together on Jonas Tyroller's Making Games Together discord server for an Art Jam and made Mini-Ecosystems and Terrariums. 

This experience serves as a showcase for all of their hard work.

Join the game dev discord server!  https://discord.gg/dP8q3M64

Controls:
  • Movement: WASD
  • Sprint: Hold Space
  • Rotate Camera: Right- or Left- Click-and-Drag
  • Reset Camera Position: H
Credits:
  • Developed by GneissKitty
  • Audio by Yän

Thank you to all participants! It was a lot of fun coordinating and assembling everyone's pieces together.
